-LcDRUl6ckaGRqycT2eD.facilities: Recommended length of visit: <1 hour; Type: Religious Sites, Cultural; Owner description: A wealth of art historical treasures and other remarkable attractions awaits visitors to the monastery complex: the collegiate church suffused with light is the southern-most example of southern German late Baroque architecture and the perfect place to pause for reflection or a quiet prayer. The cloistered courtyard adjoins the church, characterized by Gothic arches and embellished with frescoes by various artists.Numerous Gothic panel paintings and altar pieces by Friedrich Pacher and artists from his school, precious manuscripts and other liturgical treasures, as well as scientific and historical instruments are on show in the pinacotheca, while the monastery library is a real gem, accommodating around 92,000 precious volumes in its large Rococo style hall.Guided monastery tours (min. 10 persons - on reservation) take place from Monday to Saturday at 10am/11am/ 2pm/3pm and 4pm (excluding Sundays and holy days of obligation).All products from the monastery's own estates and typical Tyrolean snacks of speck, smoked sausages and various cheeses with a choice of regional bread varieties are available for tasting in the monastery cellar pub (open from 10 am to 7 pm).Tutored wine tastings for groups (min. 10 persons) can be organized on reservation. On request the tasting can be combined with a guided tour of the wine estate.Shopping: In the monastery shop all the products from Abbazia di Novacella can be bought directly. The range has been extended to include over 200 different products of other European religious establishments (open from 9.15 am to 6 pm).

-LcDRcPFG3scTz3-UPKp.info: The Hotel Armentarola is situated in an idyllic place, only 2 km from the village center of San Cassiano. From the hotel you can start for wonderful hikes into the majestic Natur of the Alta Badia. The hotel is only 100 mt walking distance from the skilift, which during the Winter takes you to the Dolomiti Superski Area (over 1000 km of pists). The hotel, runned in 3rd generation from the family Wieser, offers big rooms and suites with traditional and modern wooden furniture and high quality materials. To the courtesy set in room you can find a flat screen TV, spacious bathrooms (part of them with separate WC), bathrobe, bath slippers, i-net connection for free, as well as a courtesy set with high quality products with alpine essence. The Beauty Spa Area includes two finnish Saunas 60° and 90°, Steam Bath, Tepidarium, Kneipp Grotto, Relax Zone, Indoor Swimmingpool, a Fitness room with Technogym equipment, as well as a Beauty Area with a variety of Beauty Treatments and Massages. Directly at the reception you can buy a Skipass in winter and a Mountain pass in Summer. Kids are more than welcome in Armentarola. Besides having a special menu, they have their own bathrobs, as well as a playing room and a play ground. For a baby sitter the hotel team is more than happy to assist you. Horsebackriding on the own horsebreed ,,Haflinger and Noriker"", golf, climbing, hiking, tennis, paragliding, are only a few activities that the hotel can organize for you. Outdoor parking is for free and a garage place will be subject to charge.

-LcDRmbbjkZZTppy_Cnq.info: Our certified ""Bio-Hotel"" is situated on the doors of the nature-sanctuary ""Castelfeder"" and is deemed to be an ideal starting point for hiking, cycling and a lot of day trips in the surroundings, such as the Dolomites, Verona, lake Garda and also Venice. All the food and drinks are organic certified. Heating and warm water are heated with sustainable wood pellet. Renovations and modernisations must be sustainable ecologically and give the best conditions for a healthy and comfortable sleep. Therefore we use only natural materials, such as wood and renounce (as far as possible) to plastic. Our goal is to create a place, where an ecological vacancy/overnight is possible, without renouncing to quality and without harming the environment. Beside the organic quality we also attach great importance to regional and seasonal food quality. Therefore you'll for example not find tomatoes on our salad buffet during the winter months.We hope to welcome you soon at our hotel. We're looking forward to hear from you.
-LcDRmbbjkZZTppy_Cnq.type: Bar / Lounge; Free High Speed Internet ( WiFi ); Free Parking; Children Activities ( Kid / Family Friendly ); Pets Allowed ( Dog / Pet Friendly ); Restaurant; Suites; Swimming Pool; Wheelchair access

-LcDRoUVuto1mObi6ROJ.info: The Gray Bear Hotel is the oldest Hotel in Innichen/San Candido and one of the oldest in the hole Alps. We know the owner since 1462 and we celebrated 550 years of hotel history 2012. This long tradition is emphasized by the fact that our family owns it since 1745. Despite our tradition we have always made an effort to keep up with modern times and design, forever cherishing the antique and seeking the new. We have combined design and history in an harmonically manner. Our guests can enjoy authentically kept rooms furnished from different epochs, for instance our original Restaurant from the fifties, and the late Gothic Hotel Hall. All rooms are furnished in a different style - some rooms modern, some with original 19th. century central European style furniture. We have always tried to find perfection, paying special notice to our kitchen and wine cellar. The kitchen is lead by Star head-chef Cosimo Chirico who has an excellent reputation. The owner Franz Ladinser is a wine specialist himself - and gives his guests advice and help in their choice of wines personally. The town San Candido is a small very old town with Italian flair. The centre is a pedestrian aria with lots of shops, cafes and restaurants. Visitors can enjoy a smart and cosy stay. San Candido is the perfect places from where you can start daily trips through landscape from Alta Pusteria with his two national parks ""Drei Zinnen"" and ""Fanes Sennes Prags"". Book the hotel Orso Grigio/Grauer Bar and You will have an unforgettable holiday.
-LcDRoUVuto1mObi6ROJ.type: Bar / Lounge; Beverage Selection; Free Breakfast; Free High Speed Internet ( WiFi ); Free Parking; Children Activities ( Kid / Family Friendly ); Pets Allowed ( Dog / Pet Friendly ); Restaurant; Room Service; Shuttle Bus service; Spa; Suites; Wheelchair access; Airport Transportation

-LcDS-12WLlto1UAPnxZ.info: Christophs Hotel - The heartbeat of Schenna Welcome at Christophs - a small family-run 4-star hotel, known for it's modern, vibrant and social atmosphere - just smile, be yourself and enjoy an authentic, high-quality South Tyrolean experience! Located directly in the center of Schenna, with the local bus stop only steps away, Christophs Hotel is simply perfect for exploring Schenna, Merano and South Tyrol. Step into the one of the best gourmet hotels in Schenna and taste the most delicious of South Tyrol's flavours - a special culinary experience awaits you, with fresh local produce and multi-course dinners served daily. Enjoy stunning panoramic views from one of our 27 spacious balcony rooms. Relax in the Little Spa with sauna, steam room and indoor pool, or treat yourself with treatments and massages. Sip the best local coffee and chill out with event nights at Christophs Cafe. However you holiday, you'll love Christophs Hotel!

-LcDS2h0BXn4RCLNugEo.info: Are you looking for a spa hotel? The Hotel Feldhof can be found at one of the sunniest spots in South Tyrol - Naturno. Wellness & spa aficionados will find their holiday dreams come true at this excellent hotel in Italy. 56 rooms and suites (22 to 63 square metres) in a modern, alpine-Mediterranean design, natural wood furniture, wooden floor, non smoking rooms, free WIFI, mostly air conditioned. Water world: • 400 square metres of water area • Panoramic indoor pool with watergate connection to the heated outdoor pool (31 °C) with integrated massage- and spouted beds • Indoor relaxing areas and gallery • Large, heated outdoor salt water pool, open all year round (34 °C) with integrated massage- and spouted beds • Sports pool (27 - 29 °C), heated from March until November • Children's pool with a 35 m slide • Outdoor rest areas and romantic seating areas in the Mediterranean garden with palms, lemen- and olive trees and a koi carp pond Wellness area: • 1,500 square metres wellness & spa area • 6 different saunas (open daily from 12:00 a.m. - 07:30 p.m.) • Clay sauna 90 °C • La Fortuna sauna 85 °C (open daily from 10:00 a.m. - 08:00 p.m.) • Mountain crystal laconium 60 °C • Citrus organic sauna 55 °C • Salt water inhalation bath 42 °C • Herbal steam bath 42 °C • Indoor whirlpool 34 °C • Ice fountain • Wellness showers • Infrared cabin • Silence Lounge with 4 Senses Lounger • Light filled relaxation room with cosy loungers and magnificent panoramic views • Arabian relaxation room with water beds • ""Magic fire"" relaxation room • Fortuna relaxation room with hower lawns For our little guests: • Child-care for children over 3 years, Sunday to Friday, in July and August 7 days a week • Easter, Pentecost, July, August and October daily child- and youth-care • Light-filled children's playroom which has a direct access to the outdoor playground • Adventure children's playroom with softball cannons and table hockey • Large outdoor playground • Children's pool with a 35 m slide • Youth room with pool, table football and air-hockey • Games corner with Playstation 3 and Nintendo Wii U • Table tennis • Fun park to play football, tennis, streethockey...

-LcDS9iDnll7hxkHR8ep.info: BRIGHT DAYS. UNPLUGGED NIGHTS. Start you day with a rich and delicious breakfast at The Rosengarten Restaurant and make your business day productive in one of our 11 meeting rooms. The Four Points by Sheraton Bolzano features 4,844 square feet of meeting space and is equipped with everything you need for an effective meeting. Romantic dinner or a business lunch? At the Restaurant Valier we have a large selection of menus for a traditional culinary experience in Bolzano. If this is not enough, here's another relaxing plan: enjoy the indoor heated pool, relax area, sauna and steam bath, all part of the 7th Heaven Beauty & Wellness, a corner of heaven located on 7th floor of the hotel. Whether you're in town for work or just for fun, you'll get the style and service you want during your stay, all at a great price. All of our 189 rooms and suites have been designed to ensure a warm and cozy ambience, just like home. Don't miss the chance to rest in one of our Tyrolean rooms, furnished in a chalet style. If you plan to visit the city, this is the place to stay: strategically located, the Four Points by Sheraton Bolzano hotel is one of the best spots in town for living the lifestyles, one Northern European and the other more Mediterranean. Meeting, comfort, music, art, drinks. The business center is one of the most roomy/modern meeting venues in the city. Featuring flexible rooms and a flawless service, the Four Points Bolzano will support you to make your meeting shine. When the day is done, let all the stress and responsibilities melt away and come to the lively B-Bar to enjoy our signature cocktails and great local beers with Best Brews™. On Wednesdays don't miss the original Aperitivo Lungo, where art, music and entertainment merge creating a new concept of nightlife.

-LcDSWG8xhyIHg5kGoVQ.info: .. Antermoia! The family-run Hotel Antermoia is waiting for you in the center of the village of the same name that is located at the foot of the striking Mt. Peitlerkofel. Here, nature and mountain lovers will find a hidden paradise, where they can enjoy the unique landscape of the Dolomites. Culture, history and tradition are high on our list of priorities too. For your stay you can choose between Classic and Panorama rooms, spaciously furnished suites and fully equipped apartments for up to six people. A beautiful dining room, a traditional parlor, panoramic terrace, bar with fireplace, kids playroom, new sauna and tasty specialties of the regional and international cuisine complete the offer. In any case the Hotel Antermoia is an ideal place for family and activity holiday. Hikers and mountaineers will quickly reach the mountain pass Wurzjoch and the nature park Puez-Geisler, where they will find countless possibilities for leisurely and challenging tours. In winter the top skiing areas Kronplatz and Alta Badia are nearby. We are looking forward to see you soon!
-LcDSWG8xhyIHg5kGoVQ.type: Bar / Lounge; Free Parking; Kitchenette; Pets Allowed ( Dog / Pet Friendly ); Restaurant; Room Service; Shuttle Bus service; Ski-In / Ski-Out; Suites

-LcDSZ9hNQGJmpRjV6rO.info: Situated in a beautiful landscape on the high plateau of Ritten, the Hotel Bergfink offers a relaxing stay in an urban atmosphere. Because only a few steps away there is the cable way connecting Ritten/Renon to the heart of the historical town of Bozen/Bolzano every 4 minutes. This year, we give you the RittenCard, which offers a wide variety of opportunities for you. You can use the RittenCard to use all public transport in South Tyrol for free, that includes of course the Ritten railway and cable car. The RittenCard allows you to visit 78 museums in South Tyrol free of charge, for example: the Otzi Museum (the iceman), the Messner Mountain Museum and the Museion in Bolzano, the Living Bee museum Ritten and the South Tyrol Museum of Wine in Kaltern.The location right next door The Holzner invites you to the spa area for free, or from May to October to play a match on manicured clay courts. There is a uniquely beautiful bowling alley (Boccia) for the more thoughtful. The pool is actually a dream: You can swim right from the inside out and feel like in a lake in the middle of the Dolomites.

-LcDS_D49vBEc2Wm7I-s.info: A hotel filled with modern art in the mountains of Southern Tyrol, located directly on the ski slopes. An atmosphere that combines Alpine cosiness and contemporary architecture. You will find spacious rooms and suites, some graced by old timber panelling and furniture, others bearing the signature of Matteo Thun, the world-famous designer. This and more can be enjoyed in Colfosco, at the foot of the Dolomites. The Pizzinini family, and specially the gallery owner, photographer and globe trotter Renate Kostner-Pizzinini, have been working with great passion to create a refuge for the artistically minded, who put into first place the joy for beautiful things.

-LcDS_iQjAXIGLPuAipw.info: The 5* Hotel Castel guarantees all the required comforts and services in order to make you feel, as guests, perfectly at ease. A discreet service in an elegant and stylish ambience, the haut cuisine and the dream landscape are the adyllic frame of a relaxing break from everyday life. Whether you would like to relax yourself sorrounded by an exclusive atmosphere, or give yourself a wonderful thermal vacantion or just enjoy the enchanting view over Merano, you will be pampered by the regards and cares of the qualified team of the hotel.You are in the heart of south-tyrolean mountains. From the huge terrace you can enjoy a dream panorama on the Adige Valley and the city of Merano. All around you the enchanting mountains of South Tyrol. The beauties of nature wake up and come to life alrealdy in the early morning. A deep breath on the balcony of your room in order to taste and enjoy the sparkling morning air and the enchanting natural view: this is the perfect way to start a new relaxing day in South Tyrol.The best service is discreet, but it is able to satisfy every wish and request or doesn´t let them occur. The hostess Evelyn Dobitsch and the young host Daniel Dobitsch ensure that you have everything you need in order to feel completely at ease, like home. Even the kind cares of the personal of the hotel contribute to achieve this perfect condition of well-being of the guests.Chef Cerhard Wieser offers his guests an excellent haute cuisine. The two Michelin stars guarantee an absolut refinement of food and a sophisticated peculiarity of flavours. Chef Wieser serves both the restaurant of the hotel and the trenkerstube; both provide eclusive tastes in a stylish and elegant ambience.A thick network of hiking trails invites to discover and explore nature and the environment sorrounding the hotel. The „Carpe-Diem“ Spa of Hotel Castel offers pure wellness on a surface of 1.200 m². Here Cleopatra´s bath, the sauna, the Serail bath, the hamam, the precious stones bath and an heated outdoor pool are waiting for you. Nearby the hotel there are six golf courses. For convertibles and classic cars lovers are organized special tours, which the hotel is happy to suggest and recommend.44 refined rooms and suites with panoramic view and balcony. The furnishing is elegant – antique forniture and Verona marble bathrooms – and makes the ambience welcoming and warm, inviting to relaxation. Harmonic colours with lively contrasts delineate an unique styl. The interior design reflects the perfect combination between tradition and modernity.
-LcDS_iQjAXIGLPuAipw.type: Bar / Lounge; Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room; Free High Speed Internet ( WiFi ); Free Parking; Restaurant; Room Service; Suites; Swimming Pool; Wheelchair access

-LcDSb74LlLbEAkbzGCA.info: The Hotel Col Alto is one of the most traditional hotels in Corvara, the main village of Alta Badia. The hotel has been recently renovated merging local materials and alpine-style warmth with a new linear design. The public areas like the new lobby with fire place, the hotel bar, the cigar lounge and the Iceberg lounge bar all feature warm Alpine-style furnishings. The Hotel Col Alto offers a wide range of rooms and suites that have breathtaking views on the nature and the mountains that surround Corvara. The gourmet restaurant offers quality Italian cuisine and regional gastronomic specialties made with local products. The Hotel Col Alto also distinguishes itself for the beautiful indoor swimming pool with view on the mountains and the large Wellness Center of approximately 1,000 sq. meters which includes among others: a Turkish bath, a tepidarium, a Finnish sauna, an aromatic herbs bath, a sea salt steam grotto, a hydro-massage footbath , an ice fountain, a gym, a solarium and a wide offer of massages and wellness treatments.

-LcDSfFs-2rQ9Ii3Cb3F.info: Hotel Elephant: Stay in a hotel with a great history and distinctive characterIn 1550, King John of Portugal decided to give a “big” gift to the Emperor Maximilian II of Austria, so he purchased an elephant in India, shipped it to Genova, then planned to walk it to Austria. This giant elefant grew weary about the time it reached Bressanone and was stabled for weeks at the Villa Am Hohen Feld . Young and old came from far and wide to see this Elefant. The proprietor of the Villa was obviously a master at marketing: to maintain the fame of his establishment, he promptly renamed his hotel—you guessed it—the Elephant. A picture of the elephant was painted on the front of the building to commemorate the sensational event. But even without an elephant story this hotel is a winner with its old-fashioned charm. The sitting room, hallways, and dining rooms (three cozy rooms) incorporate antiques, museum-quality paintings, and magnificent paneling. The Elephant is also well known for its good food—fresh fruits come from the adjacent walled garden where you also find the swimming pool and an old home that has been converted into very nice bedrooms

-LcDSfXuer6y_zNlqGuC.info: Hotel Emma: your low-radiation health resort in South Tyrol. Hotel Emma in Niederdorf/Villabassa is situated right in the heart of the Dolomites and offers you history, tradition and style. Our hotel has kept its charm throughout the years and brings you true South Tyrolean hospitality combined with healthy cuisine. In addition, we have given a special focus to healthy living and quality of life, as well as a modern Wellness area with a Jacuzzi, Finnish sauna, steam bath and solarium. All our guest rooms are low-radiation. Some are fitted with period furniture, while others feature modern furniture made of larch wood. Niederdorf/Villabassa is located in the midst of the Dolomite region at an altitude of 1,154 metres above sea level. It is only 5 minutes away from Toblach/Dobbiaco, 10 minutes from Innichen/San Candido and 20 minutes from Bruneck/Brunico. It is the first Kneipp-for-me (R) adventure village and offers a Kneipp activity park, outdoor inhalation area and drinks pavilion. During the winter, the mountains invite you for some cross-country skiing, Alpine skiing, ski tours, snow-shoe hiking trips and much more. During the summer, the Dolomites can be discovered during walks, Nordic Walking tours, hiking trips, cycling and mountain bike tours, as well as climbing trips. Our hotel organises guided cycle trips five times a week.
-LcDSfXuer6y_zNlqGuC.type: Bar / Lounge; Free High Speed Internet ( WiFi ); Free Parking; Pets Allowed ( Dog / Pet Friendly ); Restaurant; Wheelchair access

Some offer free wired internet and most include a private balcony with views over the mountains.Emmy Hotel offers connected outdoor and indoor pools, a fitness centre with both bio and Finnish saunas, Turkish bath, and an indoor hot tub. Mountain bikes are also available free of charge. There are many walking and cycling paths nearby.The restaurant serves traditional cuisine of Alto Adige and international classics. Meals are served in a panoramic dining room.During winter, Hotel Emmy offers a free ski bus connecting you to the nearby slopes of the Dolomiti Superski area.

-LcDSfxVTs6x8zvcRXfM.info: Our name says it all.Here on the peaceful outskirts of St. Vigil (San Vigilio di Marebbe), in Fanes-Sennes-Braies Nature Park in the Dolomites, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, we offer a supervised activity programme including hiking, biking, and fantastic panoramic views.Our hotel is a top-notch base for ski holidays, located right on the heart of our mountain resort on the slopes of the Kronplatz mountain and the Sellaronda ski circuit. Refined taste is what makes us a style resort.In the Castello di Dolasilla – the castle of wellness on 5 levels – our guests are spoiled in true luxury with a variety of treatments, individually or in couples in our spa resort. The 1,300m2 Dolomiti SPA, included in the hotel price, offers generous wellness packages with 17 attractions for bathing, sweating and relaxing.We hold ourselves to the standards of the finest hotels in South Tyrol and offer superior quality at good prices. As a Belvita member, we are counted among the best wellness hotels in South Tyrol, offering luxurious living in a refined ambience, award-winning, light Mediterranean-Alpine cuisine, a selection of 300 choice wines, a comprehensive programme of activities both outdoors and in, and a staff of 44 friendly, competent employees. -LcDSn9iJkMWKYTA6y-p.info: Hotel Ideal Park is just 6 km from both Bolzano Dolomiti Airport and the A22 Autostrada del Brennero motorway. It offers free Wi-Fi and free underground parking, indoor pools, hot tub and sauna. The hotel's rooftop sun deck is fitted with a small swimming pool. From here you can admire panoramic views of the surrounding mountains and valleys. The Ideal Park offers spacious accommodation decorated in a classic mountain style, with wooden furniture and carpeted floors. Some rooms are complete with a balcony. A free bottle of mineral water is included in the room, along with free Italian satellite sports channels. The large underground private car park is suitable for coaches, cars and motorcycles. Cyclists will enjoy the hotel's special itineraries, and the small maintenance centre for all bikers. Ideal Park Hotel has many dining facilities, open all day. Staff is available at reception 24 hours a day. Public buses to Bolzano, where guests can visit the Otzi Museum, stop a 2-minute walk from the hotel. The Renon Earth Pyramids are a 35-minute drive away.

-LcDSr8w_sjEtSef3HiV.info: Welcome at Hotel Leitgamhof, your holiday hotel in Chienes at Plan de Corones! Idyllic atmosphere, intact nature and a large variety of sports are the best conditions for a relaxing holiday in South Tyrol. Leave your everyday routine behind you, charge your batteries and get ready for an unforgettable time. The three star Hotel Leitgamhof is situated in the heart of Chienes in the Val Pusteria in South Tyrol. Chienes has 2.700 inhabitants and makes part of the well-known holiday region Plan de Corones. Brunico, the main city of Val Pusteria is only 9 km far and reachable by car, train or bicycle. In the summer hotel Leitgamhof is the best starting point for hiking and mountain bike tours. Even the Issinger Weiher, a nice lake for swimming on hot summer days is not far of the house. In the winter the great skiing area Plan the Corones, which is one of the biggest in Europe, offers great fun on skiers or snowboard. The ski bus, train or shuttle will bring you there for free. Kids and adults will enjoy the range sports- and activity program which offers Hotel Leitgamhof during summer and winter. Experience- and family hiking tours, rafting, game and fun... in the holiday region Plan the Corones a lot is waiting for you and your family. Back from trips in the untouched nature you can relax at the natural lake in front of our house or in our wellness area. Kids will have a lot of fun in the playing room or at the playground and adults will dance at the private party room. More details you will find under ""hotel facilities"".

-LcDSwEldb4W-HqDisSk.info: Welcome to Hotel Muhlgarten **** at the foot of the Kronplatz in the Dolomites Our family-run Hotel Mühlgarten lies in Stefansdorf, in the middle of South Tyrol’s beautiful landscape. In winter, our Hotel Mühlgarten is the ideal place for skiing holidays combined with feelgood factor. After an extensive breakfast, our hotel-own skishuttle brings you to the Kronplatz valley cable car station, which is situated one kilometer away. In the afternoon he brings you back to our Hotel Mühlgarten. In summer, our hotel is a perfect starting point for hiking-tours and bike-tours through the South Tyrolean Mountains and the Dolomites. Enjoy the impressive landscape during a guided hike and explore the nature during a bike tour. While relaxing in the tranquility of a remote mountain in the middle of the green meadows and deep woods of Stefansdorf, you will leave the hustle and bustle of your daily life behind you. Relax in the sauna, swim in the Mühlgarten indoor pool, chill in the recreation room and on our lawn for sunbathing. In the evenings, our chef Hermann and his team spoils you with a gourmet menu. We constantly surprise you with a Gala Dinner, a candle light dinner, and with our dessert buffet we make your sweet dreams come true. An excellent way to end your days is a drink at the hotel bar or at the terrace. Afterwards you will sleep deep and well in our comfortable rooms and junior suites. We do everything for your relaxation and recreation. We look forward to welcoming you soon and would be pleased with being allowed to spoil you during your vacation.Hotel Mühlgarten The Gatterer-Stuefer family with the Mühlgarten Team

-LcDT3tSvPYJyMDBklHk.info: Charming, stylish and wonderfully located. Hotel Rotwand is situated on a sunny hill, right over Pineta di Laives, just 10 minutes from the region's capital town Bolzano. In addition to the comfort of a 3-star superior hotel, Hotel Rotwand also offers you the ambiance and exclusive flair of a family-run establishment, with over 20 years of experience. This can be noticed first of all in the rooms and the finely decorated accommodations - just feel like home.Comfortable and cosy, Hotel Rotwand is the perfect accommodation for long holidays as well as for short business travels. Enjoy your holidays in South Tyrol – discover excellent cuisine, breathtaking landscapes and a huge variety of sports and leisure activities to practice in your free time...Our hotel is the ideal starting point for hikes and excursions through our beautiful surroundings. Don't miss some nice day trips to the Dolomites (UNESCO World Heritage), the Garda Lake or Lake Caldaro. Whether you are a businessman or a culture lover, Hotel Rotwand is the perfect place for you. From here, you can easily reach the Fair complex of Bolzano, the airport and the historical towns of Merano and Bressanone. Welcome to Hotel Rotwand: Plattner family together with their friendly staff will be glad to take care of you.

-LcDT41M9YP_kSPl83t9.info: Welcome to the 3-star S Hotel Royal in Sesto. We are delighted to welcome you to our family-run hotel in Sesto - Moso, which nestles in the beautiful landscape of the Alta Pusteria valley and where you can enjoy a fabulous break away from it all. Comfortable rooms, delicious culinary treats and a hospitable atmosphere in the midst of breathtaking natural surroundings form the foundations of your well-earned holiday in Sesto, where every day is a unique experience dedicated to enjoyment, relaxation and variety! Family Watschinger/ Steiner We pay particular attention to the care for your room. And sometimes you will find a sweet surprise on your pillow. Standard of our rooms: Generous-sized shower, WC, single/double washbasin, hairdryer, cosmetic mirror, balcony, satellite TV, radio alarm clock, living area, safe and a Keycard to ensure your maximum security. Our rooms are all equipped with an Internet line ISDN. All our bedrooms are non smoking rooms. Summer active - Hiking in Sesto in Alta Pusteria Hiking in Sesto in Alta Pusteria is an extraordinary experience, and undoubtedly a highlight of your summer holiday in the Hotel Royal. Step out of the hotel and straight onto the breathtaking mountains, which are just waiting to be explored - either on your own or together with our mountain guide, who will be pleased to show you the best local spots on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays from June to September. Winter active - Skiing and cross country skiing in Sesto and in Alta Pusteria Skiing in Sesto in Alta Pusteria - in winter, ski and snow fans can get straight from the hotel onto the piste! The two ski regions of Monte Elmo and Croda Rossa are ideal for discerning skiers and are just a stone's throw away from the hotel. Beginners can perfect their first turns on the Waldheim practise slope, whilst athletic nature-lovers should try their hand at cross-country skiing in Sesto in Alta Pusteria.

-LcDT4qJ9HEi9MN-0xFM.info: The Hotel Savoy is suited for everybody who wants to spend a pleasurable winter holiday characterized by a mix of ski, sports and relax or an unforgettable summer holiday among a fantastic panorama, mild climate and uncontaminated nature. We dispose of a modern wellness/relax-center and a fitness-room where you can relax after a day of intense sport, or lounges where you can have a relaxing and engaging reading. This is the best starting point for wonderful hiking-, mountain bike- and Nordic walking tours in the wonderful Dolomites. In the winter, the wonderful landscape invites to cross-country skiing, snowshoe hiking and ski tours. A small but very nice skiing area in the Valley di Braies is the best place for everyone who would like to start with skiing or snowboarding. In the summer and even in the winter Hotel Trenker in Braies offers guided tours. After our guests can relax in our small but very nice spa area with Finnish sauna, steam bath, whirlpool and adventure shower. During summer, you can use the free rental of mountain- and trekking bikes. For enthusiastic hikers we offer for free hiking sticks and during the winter snowshoes. Hotel Trenker offers even a ski- and bicycle depot with ski boots dryer. Internet access you will find here at one public internet point and even in all rooms. All rooms at Hotel Trenker in the Valle di Braies, are furnished comfortably and with loving care. Even the sleeping rooms in the older part of the house and all the other rooms in the new part invite to relax during your stay and offer bath or shower, WC, SAT- TV, phone, balcony and internet access.

-LcDTsXzxBvCnX4eiFy5.info: The smart Hotel Baumwirt, owned by the hospitable family Zemmer, is located in an altitude of 1200m in Castelrotto in Italy. The surroundings are marked by the impressive landscape of the dolomites in South Tyrol, Italy. All guest-rooms and suites are furnished and decorated in a modern rustic and at the same time noble style with native wood and carefully chosen warm colours. Futhermore every room has its own balcony which offers the possibilty of enjoying a spectacular panoramic view, e.G. The valley Val Gardena. Wellness, recreation and relaxation can be enjoyed in the wellnessgarden ,,Anna"" and the hotelown cuisine offers regional as well as international specialities. During the whole year the Hotel Baumwirt in Castelrotto is just the ideal place to stay in the Dolomites in Italy.

-LcDTvkFYaVGZllhlDNc.info: In the midst of the charming Dolomites, in the well-known winter and summer vacation resort San Candido - Innichen, near Cortina d'Ampezzo, lies the PARKHOTEL SOLE PARADISO, a Jugendstil hotel recalling the splendours of Imperial Vienna. Welcome to a comfortable, elegant gem in a paradise for walkers, skiers and gourmets, where the inviting atmosphere created by over four generations of the Ortner family and the gastronomic refinements of a first-class-hotel predominate. The new Paradiso Wellness area with indoor swimming pool, finnish sauna, bio-sauna, turkish steam bath and fitness room, make your stay memorable.Each of the 42 homely bedrooms feature unique décor and furnishings: turn-of-the-Century, “roaring Twenties”, contemporary; all with bath/WC, Sat-TV, telephone, wall safe, hair-dryer, mini bar. In part with balcony or veranda.

-LcDTwg6qfJuUgt-IURO.facilities: Description: The “Paulaner Stuben” are inaugurated in September 2005, becoming the first restaurant south of the Brenner with the brand of the prestigious munich brewery “Paulaner”. The restaurant is housed in one of the oldest buildings of the city, the residence “Troilo – Troyburg” dating from the thirteen century, and is able to reach both the shopping archades ”Portici – Lauben” and the street “Silbergasse – Via Argentieri”. The three spacious dining rooms ( “Stuben”) are characterized by beautiful vaulted ceilings and friendly wood furniture can accommodate up to 150 people. In the warm season is set up outside a terrace for about seventy guests with tables and chairs reminiscent of the splendid traditional beer gardens in Munich.The choice of menu is much wider. It ranges in fact from the “classics Paulaner”, brewery typical local dishes such as dumplings, shank and grilled meat served in copper pans, till to the base plates of Mediterranean cuisine such as pasta, vegetables, fish and of course delicious pizzas baked in two variants , the classic round pizza and pizza by the meter served on elegant wooden cutting boards ( “Pizza on board”).The culinary concept behind our “BEERHALL” is in fact the daily search of harmony between the style and tradition of the Bavarian restaurants and the quality of the italian cuisine.; Dining options: Breakfast/Brunch, Reservations, Late Night

-LcDU238SQyc__j_Pfor.facilities: Cuisines: Pizza; Dining options: Reservations, Delivery, Late Night; Description: Die Pizzeria Martina in Moos in Sexten macht eine fantastische Pizza und punktet mit guter Kuche. -LcDUCivd5NVrPgfo7GB.facilities: Dining options: Reservations, Late Night; Description: Ristorante: Fascino - Ambiente storico I Bagni Egart sono dal 1430 una locanda e sono i Bagni termali piu vecchi in Tirolo. La famiglia Platino ha trasformato negli anni la locanda nel ristorante Onkel Taa, che ospita anche il museo dedicato alla storia degli Asburgo. Nel ristorante e nel museo, si fa una gita nei tempi reali e imperiali ... Goduria culinaria Nel ristorante Onkel Taa, viene cucinato nel contesto della tradizione Asburgo. La cucina e creativa che gioca sugli ingredienti locali, alcuni in particolare autoprodotti - dalle erbe e dalle verdure biologiche che vengono coltivate nell`orto a fianco del ristorante - fino alle autentiche star della casa, le lumache dal proprio allevamento proposte in un'infinita di varianti. Ogni giorno vengono proposti piatti creativi che abbinano la tradizione Asburgo alla modernita e soprattutto nella qualita. Si possono gustare anche i piatti prelibati dell`Imperatrice Elisabetta - meglio conosciuta come Sissi e dell`Imperatore Francesco Giuseppe I. Janett Platino ogni giorno propone delle novita in cucina e si diverte a incuriosire, come nel caso delle specialita all'ortica, declina i sapori tipici della tradizione locale in diverse versioni, ne rilegge i canoni classici avvalendosi con misurata inventiva di materie prime inaspettate, qua e la da sfogo alla fantasia anche nella presentazione.; Good for: Romance, Special occasions; Price range: 5 € - 27 €; Cuisines: Eclectic, Healthy, Family Fare

-LcDUM7xZyHiAA7Y1I2T.facilities: Dining options: Reservations, Late Night; Description: ""La Gana"", un termine che ci porta indietro nel tempo evocando l'immaginazione degli antichi abitanti dei nostri boschi, che si nutrivano esclusivamente dei prodotti che offriva loro la natura. Con questa filosofia nasce anche il Ristorante Gourmet del Hotel Cristallo a La Villa, che intende sfruttare le ricchezze locali ed alpine presentando piatti di selvaggina e carni scelte ed altre prelibatezze delicatamente abbinate con sapori dei nostri boschi. Lo Chef, Fabio Groppi da grande importanza all'elevata qualita e genuinita dei prodotti sapientemente abbinati per incantare i palati piu esigenti, sempre alla ricerca di nuovi aromi e sapori particolari. Valorizza i profumi della memoria usando per le proprie paste, esclusivamente fatte in casa, farine di kamut o di carrube ed erbe aromatiche trasformandole in sapori di oggi con composizioni creative di alta gastronomia; Cuisines: Italian

-LcDUS0TlQGdbc1_I7Cn.facilities: Cuisines: Italian, Eclectic, International; Dining options: Breakfast/Brunch, Reservations, Late Night; Good for: Families with children, Local cuisine; Description: The ancient South Tyrolean farmhouse of the 12th century was renovated according to its old style and opened as a restaurant in 1977. Since then it has been restored and enlarged every now and then. There are different “Stube” offering space for 10 to 70 people such as the Josef Stube, the Kamin Stube with fireplace, the Romantikstube, the Torggl and the cellar. In addition there are two partly covered gardens: the Palms Garden with 180 seats and the Beer Garden with 60 seats.A unique dining experience is waiting for you at the Ruster Restaurant. We have a wide selection of dishes, hopefully enough to satisfy every diner. Why not try local dishes and the delicious traditional cuisine of South Tyrol? What about a superb dinner in the intimate and inviting ambience of the typical “stube” or in the beer garden? Our chef cooks impeccably executed menus of local and international dishes that are served in relaxed surroundings. Obviously the dinner is complemented by an excellent wine list or by the most exquisite beers. Enjoy dining in a different way and remember Virginia Wolf’s words: ""One cannot think well, love well, sleep well if one has not dined well”...

The Temple Bar in Bolzano is one the few places in which bands can have a chance to perform. While in other pubs of the city town almost no one has been playing guitar for years, in Temple Bar in Bolzano there is always a good reason to play good music. The only important thing is that rocks. Played music has to be genuine and direct. During the summer time when concerts take place in front of the Temple Bar, almost the whole square is overcrowded, during winter they are organized inside the pub.A little English knowledge here is always welcome, regular customers of the Temple Bar come from all over Europe to catch the football or music of just to catch up with good friends; Price range: 0 € - 8 €; Cuisines: Irish; Good for: Bar scene

-LcDUtCjx_Eo21KecllK.info: Hiking hotel Europa - A paradise for wellness and hiking fans The most beautiful mountain tours at Alpe di Siusi/Seiser Alm Welcome to Vitalpina Hiking Hotel Europa! Surrounded by the marvelous landscape of the Sciliar/Schlern-Catinaccio/Rosengarten nature park, 4**** hotel Europa is located in the old town center of Siusi/Seis, on an altitude of 1,000 m above sea level. Vacations in our resort mean vacations in the heart of stunning nature at the foot of Alpe di Siusi/Seiser Alm, Europe's highest alp. At Hiking Hotel Europa in Siusi/Seis you have the chance to go on guided mountain tours in the Dolomites UNESCO World Heritage site. Thanks to the Vitalpina principle, the hotel offers a range of wellness services as well as healthy, traditional cuisine which will put you in good shape of winter and summer activities in the fascinating mountains. A 5**** hiking hotel, Hotel Europa is the place to be for hiking enthusiasts. At the hotel you will be provided with all the necessary equipment such as maps and hiking poles, as well as having the opportunity to take part in as many as five guided hikes per week in summer and three guided show shoe hikes per week in winter. Discover the stunning world of the mountains! Welcome to our hotel! Your host Michael Trocker
